There must be no

tags in the output.
input: Love enriches life. Friendship strengthens bonds. Family supports.
validityText:
The given input consists of the following sentences: "Love enriches life.", "Friendship strengthens bonds.", and "Family supports.". 

According to the input specification, the paragraph must contain at least three sentences. The provided input consists of exactly three sentences, satisfying this requirement. The specification also allows for words or phrases to be emphasized using <strong> and <em> tags. However, there is no requirement that these tags must be present in the text. Therefore, the absence of these tags does not constitute a violation of the specification.

Since the paragraph meets the requirement of containing at least three sentences and does not violate any other rules specified, it is compliant with the specification.

OK
